trans-unit.source: Represents a control that renders text that can be changed by the user.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un controllo che esegue il rendering di testo che può essere modificato dall'utente.

trans-unit.source: Controls, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> and those that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, provide a text property that can be changed by a page user.
trans-unit.target: Controlli, ad esempio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>e quelli che derivano da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, fornire una proprietà di testo che può essere modificata da un utente della pagina.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: When the text property is changed, an event is raised to notify handlers that the property has changed.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene modificata la proprietà text, viene generato un evento per notificare i gestori che la proprietà modificata.

trans-unit.source: Classes that implement IEditableTextControl must define the <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl.TextChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Le classi che implementano IEditableTextControl devono definire il <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl.TextChanged>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl.TextChanged>

trans-unit.source: Although the IEditableTextControl interface contains only the <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl.TextChanged> event, it inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl> interface, which defines a <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Anche se l'interfaccia IEditableTextControl contiene solo il <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl.TextChanged>evento eredita dal <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl>interfaccia che definisce un <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl.TextChanged>

trans-unit.source: To implement the IEditableTextControl interface, a control must define the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl.TextChanged> event that occurs when the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A> property changes between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: Per implementare l'interfaccia IEditableTextControl, è necessario definire un controllo di <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A>proprietà e <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl.TextChanged>evento che si verifica quando il <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A>le modifiche alle proprietà tra gli invii al server.</xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl.TextChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: In those classes, the event is raised through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnTextChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.OnTextChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods.
trans-unit.target: In tali classi, l'evento viene generato tramite il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnTextChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.OnTextChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.OnTextChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnTextChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A class that implements the IEditableTextControl interface could define a similar method for raising the event.
trans-unit.target: Una classe che implementa l'interfaccia IEditableTextControl può definire un metodo simile per la generazione dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the content of the text changes between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il contenuto del testo viene modificato tra gli invii al server.

trans-unit.source: The TextChanged event occurs when the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A> property changes between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: L'evento TextChanged si verifica quando il <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A>le modifiche alle proprietà tra gli invii al server.</xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: An implementation of this event can be found in either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> control.
trans-unit.target: Un'implementazione di questo evento è reperibile in entrambi i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>
